price: 57. La création des cieux et de la terre est certes plus grande que la création des hommes. Mais, pour la plupart, les hommes n’en savent rien.
arabic: لَخَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ خَلۡقِ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lakhalqu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi akbaru min khalqi al-nāsi walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
